thread.title: Where can I buy a Corbyn 'Nike' t-shirt that took Glastonbury by storm?

author: Simon Meechan
title: Where can I buy a Corbyn 'Nike' t-shirt that took Glastonbury by storm?
text:
Swoosh Corbyn t-shirts were a hit at Glastonbury Share Get daily     
Forget Ed Sheeran, the Foo Fighters and, if you can, Barry Gibb. 
If you have followed this year’s Glastonbury music festival you will have noticed Labour leader Jeremy Corbyn caused quite a stir with his appearance on Saturday afternoon on the Pyramid stage. 
Corbyn-themed flags, sculptures and other memorabilia proved a massive hit with festival goers who broke into song with frequent choruses of ‘Oh, Jeremy Corbyn’ set to the White Stripes’ ‘Seven Nation Army’. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now 
One of the most popular fashion items was a “Jeremy Corbyn” t-shirt which featured his name and a Nike-style swoosh underneath. 
And if you are interested one of these t-shirts, this is how you can get hold of them. 
The Nike Swoosh Corbyn t-shirts and a selection of others bearing his name can be bought from a number of online outlets. 
Teespring has them here for £17.97 
Or you could try eBay here . 
The Glastonbury Corbyn-mania was quite a contrast with last year. 
In 2016, the Islington North MP cancelled his appearance at the festival at Worthy Farm in Somerset following the Brexit vote and questions about his leadership. 
Jeremy Corbyn receives rockstar welcome in front of thousands at Glastonbury 
Today not only his is party five points ahead in the opinion polls, Corbyn himself is now hugely popular. 
However, we’re aware not everybody is a Corbyn fan. And, in the interest of balance, if you’re a Tory voter and want to celebrate today’s coalition agreement with the DUP, you could pick up this Theresa May t-shirt. Read More
